visions.title: The vision of the sheep, the Evil Birds, the Wild cows and The Lion hidden in the Lamb!
visions.headerText: The vision of the sheep, the Evil Birds, the Wild cows and The Lion hidden in the Lamb!
visions.content:
Vision: My spirit was caught up into the visions of God and I saw a great and terrible oracle from the Most High pertaining to the affairs of Men!

I saw a Great field and there were many sheep that found pasture there and fed abundantly.

All of a sudden, I saw that there were wild beasts hiding in caves seeking to devour the sheep but each time they came for the sheep, the sheep will run away from them because the sheep saw the wild beasts from afar.

Then I saw something else. The beasts of the field made an alliance with the birds of the air and implored them to join them saying that if they join them to defeat the sheep; the birds of the air will feed on the fruits of the garden while the beasts feed on the flesh and blood of the sheep.

After this, I saw how the birds of the air gathered in thousands and came upon the sheep and began to pluck out their eyes. When they had plucked out their eyes, the sheep were all blind and started running all around the field. The beasts came out from their caves and attacked the sheep and overcame them and the sheep were scattered across the field and because the sheep had become blind they could no longer protect the garden.
So the birds of the air came down and fed on all the fruits of the field until it became a wilderness; extremely dry and harsh.
I saw Many of the sheep walking and looking for pastures but they could not find and the sheep were very bitter on account of their affliction and their thirst, for there was no pasture neither was there water.
The sheep wandered in the wilderness and behold I saw how wild beasts that looked like cows came from the mountains and began to attack, afflict and oppress the sheep. They trampled the sheep underfoot and began to pierce the sheep with their horns. Their horns drank the blood of the sheep.
The sheep wept and wept but there was no one to save them from the hands of the wild beasts who mercilessly destroyed them.

As the sheep began to cry, their voice reached to the heavens unto the Ears of the God of All Creation and it was decreed that in the fullness of time a Saviour will be given to them!
And I saw how in the Midst of the sheep, a Great White Lamb without spot or Blemish was born.
On its head there were seven horns, each of a different colour, texture and substance.
This Great Lamb moved with Meekness in the Midst of the sheep to gather them unto itself but the sheep did not heed to its voice.

All of a sudden, The Wild beasts attacked the Great Lamb, and in the Midst of the Battle the Lamb was slain for it was wounded on its side.
Out of the wound, water and blood flowed exceedingly like a river. It gushed out of its wound on the side and I saw that the sight of its blood was like a bright fire.
It came to Pass that some of the Wild Beasts gathered to drink the blood of the Lamb but they were destroyed because the blood burnt hot like a consuming fire.
When the other wild beasts saw this, they fled at the sight of the blood of the Lamb which pursued them and carried them away like a river and flood of fire!
Then I saw that the earth opened its mouth and drank the blood of the Lamb that was slain and when this happened there was a great earthquake.
When this earthquake occurred, I saw the strongholds of the wild beasts collapsing for they had made for themselves refuges in the midst of rocks on high mountains from which they came forth to terrify, afflict and oppress the Sheep!
All their refuges crumbled and I saw the waters that came out from the side of the Lamb become a fountain of water and it flowed all over the Wilderness and it became a fruitful garden.

The sheep were led to the waters and their eyes were washed in the waters and they began to see and they greatly rejoiced in the garden and were made to lie in the green pastures.
I saw that a Great White Cloud came down from heaven from the throne of God and covered the Lamb and then all of a sudden there were thunderings and when the cloud was lifted up I did not see the Lamb again but in its place I saw a Great Lion.
The Lion was Made of Fire. It was beautiful and peaceful yet at the same time terrible and Powerful and its eyes were flashes of lightning!

And at this the vision ceased, and I gave thanks to the Almighty God who is the Creator of All things for in His purpose, he ordained the Lamb to redeem his people and in His wisdom he hid the Lion in the Lamb to be the Judge of His People!

Great Grace
The Priest of God
Prophet Kevin OnLine

visions.title: The Vision of the Gathering of the Heavenly Army and the Command of the King of Kings!
visions.headerText: The Vision of the Gathering of the Heavenly Army and the Command of the King of Kings!
visions.content:
I was caught up in the visions of God, and I saw a great gathering of beings, both earthly and heavenly. In the vision, a trumpet was blown, and its sound was like thunder. The spirits of those who heard the trumpet were caught up into the courts of Zion. I know this because my spirit was among those caught up into the realms of God. By the intelligence of the Spirit, I understood that the sound of the trumpet was the technology through which the spirits of the chosen ones are summoned into the courts of Zion for the assembling of the saints.

Though the summoning happened in the twinkling of an eye, I was privileged by the Holy Spirit to capture some details of the spiritual journey. I saw how the spirits of those summoned left the Earth as rays of light, moving beyond the sun, moon, and stars into the highest heavens, the abode of the great King, Jesus Christ the Righteous One.

At the assembling grounds, I saw countless people, each of them clothed in light. I wondered who these people were, and I heard a voice beside me saying, /These are the hidden ones, the ones who were prepared and kept for such a time as this. These are those who have been redeemed from all tribes, nations, and tongues of the Earth to serve the great King./

When the voice spoke these words, my attention was drawn again to the heavenly council, as there were sounds of the trumpet signaling that the King was about to address the council. The Lord Jesus Himself, dressed in the majestic garments of a king and warrior, came forth, He wore a white robe, and there was a red sash on it upon his chest with an embroidery made of gold and precious stones, on His Head was a golden crown, His eyes were like flames of fire, and when He spoke, His voice sounded like the roar of a Lion and many rushing waters, gentle yet bold.

The Lord Jesus began addressing the assembly with so much authority and he said;
/I am the King of Kings and the Lord of Lords. Heaven and Earth are mine. Go into all the Earth and conquer territories in my name and for my kingdom./
When He said this, He breathed upon the entire assembly, and it was like a dew, a bright cloud covering everyone. While the cloud covered each being, the breath of Christ transformed into a sword in their hands. The swords varied in shape, size, and color, but they were all aflame.

Then the Lord stretched out His hands, and lightning came forth from His fingers, entering directly into each person. Immediately, they were sent back to Earth, falling like rains of light onto every continent.

As these people returned to the Earth realm, the evil beings that had formed clouds of darkness and veils over nations gave way when they saw these lights descending from heaven. The evil clouds that tried to resist or deny entrance to them were burst open, for nothing could stop these lights.

Then I found myself back in the flesh, awakened from the vision, and I gave thanks to God for this wonderful insight into His will for His people !

The Lord Jesus spoke of so many things concerning the church and the World, Many of these things I am not permitted to say them for the authority to say them has not been granted to me for the Lord through the Wisdom of the Spirit has committed that charge to other servants of God who were also brought in as watchers in that assembly !

In this council the Lord Jesus also addressed the events that will happen in the world, and these occurrences will be for signs and wonders unto the Sons of Men but again I was commanded to seal up those words for they shall be known in their own time! But with the insight i have into the things that will happen, i urge us all to obey the instructions of the Lord Jesus to Watch and Pray!

Dear saints, there is a call in the Spirit. Many of you were present in that heavenly council in the Spirit, even if you may not have retained full awareness. If you have a strong burden in your heart for the Lord Jesus Christ to be known and glorified all over the Earth, then you are part of this army.

The time is now. The Lord Jesus is gathering unto Himself an army of men and women who will forsake the pleasures of the world and go into all the Earth to manifest the power and glory of the Kingdom of Christ.

If you believe you are part of this army of God, then you must consecrate yourself for 120 days unto the Lord, and the Lord Jesus will reveal Himself and His will to you.

Great Grace
The Priest of God
Prophet Kevin Nubidga
Prophet Kevin OnLine

visions.title: The Vision of The Cloud of Witnesses!
visions.headerText: The Vision of The Cloud of Witnesses!
visions.content:
The visions of God came upon me while I laid in my bed and thoughts about heavenly things flooded my mind. A great presence came upon me and I became weak and then I was carried into this Supernatural occurrence whether it was in the body or out of the body i cannot tell but as the Lord Liveth and My Soul Liveth the vision is true and was Extremely Vivid and Real.

I heard a voice from heaven that spoke saying /there are Giants in the Spirit/ the voice said this repeatedly, then suddenly it was like the roof of my room vanished because I could see the sky while laying in my bed, and I saw a portal opening in the sky and I saw beings riding on heavenly horses of fire. The Horses were white and the men who rode on them were dressed in white with a red cloth on around their shoulders. After them I saw different kinds of heavenly beings, some had wings, some had no wings, the Cherubims too were amongst all of them and were riding on the clouds and coming towards my house.

As they came and stood above my roof, behold were the saints of old coming in a multitude, surprisingly when I saw any one of them, immediately in my heart I knew the name of the person. They came and entered my room and stood, all around my bed, Moses, Elijah, Samuel, David, Abraham, Deborah, Peter, Paul, John and so on. The Saints whose accounts were recorded in the Old Testament stood on my left side, while those whose accounts were recorded in the New Testament were on my right side.

Then again I heard a voice but this time it sounded like many waters and thundered saying /These are Giants in the Spirit, you are called to be amongst them why are You Sleeping?/

When He said that, I was still on the bed paralysed by the sight of the heavenly beings, and all of them turned and looked at me and their eyes were like Rays of Lights piercing my soul, as I looked at them, through their eyes I started seeing all the great deeds they wrought for the Lord in a moment of time.

It is unexplainable how I look at them and see years of their walk with God just in a moment of time, then tears began to flow down my eyes and suddenly I saw them no more, and I realized I was alone in my room.

Today I announce the Cry of the Spirit unto You;
/There are Giants in the Spirit and you are called to be amongst them, why are you sleeping/

The kingdom of God needs you, your generation needs to see God through you , why are you sleeping?
Awake o army of God Awake and the Light of Christ will shine upon you!
Awake to your Prophetic Assignment, Forget about your past, deny yourself the pleasures of the flesh and become part of those who will advance the kingdom of God in this generation by bearing the burdens of God!

Say this prayer with me;
Oh Holy Spirit, awaken me and enlist me in the Rank of Witnesses unto Christ.

visions.title: The Vision about Apostle Johnson Suleman!
visions.headerText: The Vision about Apostle Johnson Suleman!
visions.content:
I was in the visions of the Lord, other Pastors and I were gathered in a field and we were praying, suddenly we heard thunderings and there was a shaking like an earthquake, and we were caught with fear and much trembling and while we began to ponder on what was happening, I looked and I saw a strange sight; I saw that it was APOSTLE SULEMAN who was coming, but in the vision he was so tall that his head was in the clouds and the earthquakes were caused by his footsteps and the thunder was the sound of his voice when he spoke. When we saw all these, we were caught up with awe and we were all looking at him and then we began to follow him, running behind him, and one of the Pastors said /My Prophet, Pray for me/ then an Angel of the Lord appeared with a flaming sword of fire and pointed at the man and said to him; /Johnson Suleman is not your Prophet, he is the Prophet of the Most High God, and The Lord God of the Holy Prophets has vested his jealousy upon him, call him not your Prophet for he is the Prophet of the Most High God sent to you./

When that was said, a Cloud of whirlwind made up of lightning came from heaven in a swift speed, and carried Apostle Suleman and I saw as it were, he was being carried across the Nations of the World, and whenever he stepped his feet, there was an earthquake and a shaking that caused the foundations of the nations to be exposed and the foundations that had gone out of course where realigned and I notice something when he stepped his legs on mountains that they were leveled, when he stepped his legs on the crooked places, they were made straight, when he stepped his legs on the rough places, they were made smooth, and while he was speaking hundreds of thousands of people gathered around him, when he spoke there were thunderings, and at the sound of the thundering chains of sin were broken and I realized something - when the thunder sounded, lightening bolts will leave from his body and enter the bodies of the people and immediately, their bodies were /repaired./ I don't know how I can explain this, but somehow distorted, broken, damaged, bones, organs, flesh and blood was restored to health when the lightening entered the people and I saw how when the lightening entered people and demons left their bodies instantly. I saw evil spirits that looked like monkeys, dogs, serpents forced out of the people's bodies by the lightning and there was great rejoicing among the people and they began giving praises to God and I heard them say /Glory be to God Most High, who has given such power to men./

At this point, I began to say in my heart, what kind of man is this?

Then the Angel of the Lord turned and said unto me, / Johnson Suleman is a Prince in Zion/
Then I pondered within myself - Prince?
Then the angels replied unto me

/who you sons of men call Generals of God, are known as PRINCES in the courts of Zion, in heaven they are not known as Generals but as Princes./

Then when he said this I was given a strange privilege, I saw a mighty gate opened in the spirit and Apostle Suleman entered through it, I was not permitted to enter but I was granted the grace through the mercies of the Lord to watch what was happening and being said and I saw a council of 120 men sitting on thrones and their discussions were concerning the nations of the earth, and the affairs of men. Distinctively, I saw the man of God Prophet UEBERT ANGEL sitting among them, and all what was decreed in the Great and Holy Council was sealed in scrolls and given to the Holy men who were in charge of executing the written judgements over nations through their Prophecies and I heard it was said to them /You Must Prophesy Again about Many People, Nations, languages and Kings!/

While I was still in amazement, my spirit was taken out of the vision and I woke up on my bed with much trembling and in Great awe of the Lord God of the Holy Prophets and a sentiment of high esteem and honor to his Servants the Prophets.

Great Grace!
The Priest of God

visions.title: The Vision of The Violent Storm and the Tower built on the Rock!
visions.headerText: The Vision of The Violent Storm and the Tower built on the Rock!
visions.content:
On the 5th day of the 7th Month of the Year 2021, I was Carried by the Spirit of God into the Visions of Yahweh Elohim ;

In this Vision I saw how the heavens were black with clouds and violent winds, and everyone who saw this was caught up with fear and trembling, and it came to pass that a Heavy violent Rain began to fall and so many people rushing for refuge, many were confused and were running left and right; then I saw a very Big Building standing on a Rock and the building looked like a tower, many people began to run into the building, while people were rushing into the building, I saw some women that began discouraging other people who were running into the building for refuge, telling them that there are too many people already in those buildings, that there is no more room in the building to accommodate them, and that any time from now, the building will collapse, while she was speaking some people believed her and turned back while others continued running into that building, then I saw that she also had her own building, but what I realised was her building was standing on sand, but some people went into her building, at this point the Rain increased and became very violent and when it beat upon the building that was on the rock, the shaking was strong but this Great House stood firm.
As the flood continued moving everything else on its way was destroyed, and I saw how some people had themselves under trees, yet the violent flood uprooted the trees, then the Flood reached to the level where the other house that was standing on the sand was, as it beat the house the house was totally destroyed at the twinkling of an eye, and all those who were in it, were carried along by the flood!

At this point, I saw that everything had been carried away, only those in the House that was on the rock survived and I saw them praising God, and the clouds became bright and there was a great light!

At this Level the vision ended, and I was disturbed with the vision so I began praying against the Storm, then the word of the Lord Came to Me thus;
/Prophet of the Most High, do not weary yourself in Praying against that storm, there is nothing You or the Sons of Men can do to avert that storm for it is by the decree of the Sovereign Lord!
O the Lion has roared who will not fear ? the Lord Has Spoken who will not hear ? The storm is coming, so therefore Prepare Yourself less Your Faith Fail, and you faint in the Days of adversity/.

>>At this point it was revealed to me, that that house on the rock is the Church of the Living God.



>> The woman is the spirit of Jezebel and her house is a false religious system, Babylon!

>>The spirit of Jezebel will try to distract many from seeking refuge in the Church.

>>The storm is significant of judgments of wars, plagues, famines that will come upon the earth!

>>The Church of the Living God shall be the only city of refuge from these evil occurrences!

1-The Holy Spirit is calling on Christians to depart from the path of unrighteousness, depart from unholiness, depart from worldliness, return to the Lord with heartfelt prayers of repentance, commit your heart to the Lord through fellowship with the Spirit and Meditation on the scriptures!

2-The Holy Spirit is calling on Ministers of the Gospel, to focus on Soul winning, to Preach the Gospel of the Kingdom with boldness and He will confirm the words with signs, wonders, and Miracles for the Salvation of Souls!

3-For those who are not yet in Christ, the Holy Spirit Says as You Hear the Voice of God, Harden not your hearts, its time to seek refuge in the Church of the Living God for nothing in this world can save you from the storm coming!

The Priest of God.
Great Grace!

visions.title: The Vision of The Lord Jesus And His Message To The World!
visions.headerText: The Vision of The Lord Jesus And His Message To The World!
visions.conten:
Today, at the airport in Lagos Nigeria, I felt the spirit of revelation come upon me heavily, so I looked for a quiet corner and yielded myself and fell into a deep sleep and my spirit was carried into the visions of God.

In this vision, I saw very huge chariot or train that was ascending up a hill on which was found a very beautiful city which is made of Gold and the gates of all precious jewels. In the chariot, there was a very beatiful woman, dressed in a long white gown made of golden embroidery. On her head was a crown, she was so gentle and quiet but very elegant and beautiful. Then I realized that there were some men around her whose assignment was to serve her and to provide what she needed for the journey.

As the chariot continued on its ascending journey, at a certain place there was a woman on the wayside but in the valley, she was also very beautiful, but she was dressed in a black transparent gown through which her nakedness could be seen, she was very seductive in appearance and had painted her face. Around her where many men who indulged in all manner pleasures of the flesh, in fornication and drunkenness and these men worshipped her body as an idol and when they did she undressed herself and satisfied every one of their cravings of their flesh.

When the men in the chariot saw this happening, I saw how some began to complain and murmur and I clearly heard one say /see these men are out there enjoying with that woman, while we are here enduring with this woman./

Then I saw how some of the men jumped out of the chariot and went and met the woman by the wayside and she willingly received them and satisfied all their lusts of the flesh, these men began fornication with her, and they became intoxicated with her wine and began worshipping her body, while those in the chariot continued the Journey with the woman.

When they got to another place, some of those men who went to the woman at the wayside came back into the chariot, and when they came they began to influence the other men in the chariot saying that they don't have to only endure with this woman, they can also enjoy with her.

Then something strange happened - those men who hath known the woman at the wayside began trying to dress up the woman in the chariot to look like the woman on the wayside. They forcefully painted her face, and began teaching her the ways of the woman at the wayside so she may look, talk and act like the woman on the way side, and the more they did that, the more she was sorrowful. They were asking her that why are they here enduring with her, while others are enjoying with the woman on the wayside. Then I saw some of those men bodily coming to the woman in the chariot to indulge in fornication with her but she refused and when they tried to force her, she screamed with a shout that pierced the heavens and resounded in all the heavens and the earth, and after she screamed, a voice like thunder spoke from the heavens with great authority, and this what I heard the voice say;

/who are they that want to defile my bride? Know you not that the bride of Christ ought to be presented to her groom as a chaste virgin without stain or blemish?
You were ordained friends of the bride groom that you may wait upon the bride till the groom comes for the Great Marriage Supper of the Lamb, but you have allowed your heart to be seduced and corrupted by the woman Babylon, and now you want to defile the bride of the Glorious King.
Behold, because you have done this you have arisen the jealousy of the Great King, and you have awaken the wrath of the consuming fire, and all they that want to defile His bride shall be utterly consumed/
When this voice spoke, judgment began in the chariot. A fiery wind blew across the chariot and (oh Lord have mercy,) I saw how some were cast out of the chariot into the valley, some were brought low, some were stripped of their rod of authority and yet others were exalted, others were brought in and others were given great authority.
At this point, I came out from the vision with trembling and fear saying; /Lord Jesus show us mercy and grant us grace to walk before you perfectly /

The Priest of God.

visions.title: The Vision Of The Palm Branches
visions.headerText: The Vision Of The Palm Branches
visions.content:
I was caught up in the visions of God where we were gathered in the assembly of the saints and the Holy Spirit manifested Himself and prompted us to worship the Lord Jesus, and as the whole congregation were worshipping, the awe of the presence of God brought me to my knees in reverence to the LORD JESUS, and the spirit of Holiness granted me utterance and I began to glorify and magnify the Lord Jesus with the confessions of my mouth, and I was filled with the awareness of the Majesty and Dominion of the Lord Jesus and I began to sing this song;

/When we all get to heaven /
what a Day of rejoicing that will be /
when we all see Jesus /
we will sing and shout Victory /

And while I was singing this, I saw a thick white Cloud come upon me and suddenly my spirit was caught up into the realms of God and I saw myself instantly kneeling before the Lord Jesus, the Only Potentate, the King of kings and Lord of lords -
His throne was made of Gold, and transparent glass and He sat exalted upon the throne, I mean highly exalted and His throne was surrounded with a cloud that had a rainbow, and therein were flashes of lightning and out of which proceeded voices that sounded like thunder saying, /Holy, Holy, Holy is the Lord God Almighty, Glory, Glory, Glory be unto He who sits on the throne, for His dominion endures forever more/.

Then I was filled with Holy Fear, and my head was bowed down, and as I lifted my head to behold He that dwells in inapproachable light, I could not see his face, for it was full of a burning and shining light, and then He spoke to me, His voice sounded like many waters but was so gentle and refreshing to the heart, the Lord Jesus said these words;

/Verily I say unto you, all of those who have confessed my name and have not been ashamed of my Gospel, will surely be carried to heaven when their days are fulfilled and they shall be where I am for I have prepared a place for them in the bosom of Abba Father, but the issue is, what shall they bring when it is time to come and meet me?

Shall you come before your Master empty handed?/

Then I turned and looked and I saw many beings in white garments and some had palm branches in their hands and some their hands were empty, some had many palm branches and some had just few.

And all these came before the throne of the Great King and cast their palm branches down before the Lord one after another, and the Lord received it from their hands and gave them crowns, each crown was different in size and beauty, some crowns had more stars on them than others and some had more precious stones than others but it appeared to be that it is your palm branches that will determine the kind of crown you will receive.

And while I was wondering what this could be in my heart, it is like a being heard my thoughts, and He walked up to me and said to me, this is the meaning of this mystery:

/If you do good works and win souls into the Kingdom of God, when you come to meet the Lord, all your good works for the advancement of his glorious kingdom will be in your hands in the Heavenly realms as palm branches, and the crowns given to them is their reward which they will receive from the Lord their God for their sacrifices for his kingdom/

And the Holy Spirit brought this scripture to my remembrance which I have been reading but never understood;

Revelation 7:9 KJV
/After this I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands;/

And I began saying to myself I must do good works and win souls for the advancement of the Kingdom of Jesus Christ, then suddenly my spirit was back in my body in church and I was in utter amazement because on earth it was not up to 30 minutes but while in the heavenly realm, it was like 7 hours because I saw and heard so many things which I've not been permitted nor given the utterance to tell the sons of men.

But the Lord Jesus has Graciously sent me to bring this message to the church today;
/Shall you meet your maker empty handed?
What are your good works?
Where are the souls you have converted from the World to the Lord?/

If you are born again, then going to heaven is a sure truth because salvation is by faith in Christ and not by works but your reward in heaven will be by your works which are an expression of your faith in Christ.

What will you bring to the Lord Jesus, who gave Himself for you and washed you from your sins and through whose blood you are reconciled to the Righteous Father?

As a saint, do not just be excited about being carried to heaven when your days are fulfilled, even much more be excited at the palm branches you will present to your master Jesus Christ.

Oh Dear Saint,
Shall you meet your Master Empty Handed?
Have you not read this scripture:
Deuteronomy 16:16 KJV
Three times in a year shall all appear before the Lord thy God in the place which he shall choose; in the feast of unleavened bread, and in the feast of weeks, and in the feast of tabernacles: /and they shall not appear before the Lord empty/.

May the God of All Grace grant us grace and wisdom to be and do what is ordained for us that will advance the Glorious kingdom of Christ in the Name of Jesus

Great grace
The Priest of God

visions.title: The Vision of The Violent Storm and the Tower built on the Rock!
visions.headerText: The Vision of The Violent Storm and the Tower built on the Rock!
visions.content:
On the 5th day of the 7th Month of the Year 2021, I was Carried by the Spirit of God into the Visions of Yahweh Elohim;

In this Vision I saw how the heavens were black with clouds and violent winds, and everyone who saw this was caught up with fear and trembling, and it came to pass that a Heavy violent Rain began to fall and so many people rushing for refuge, many were confused and were running left and right; then I saw a very Big Building standing on a Rock and the building looked like a tower, many people began to run into the building, while people were rushing into the building, I saw some women that began discouraging other people who were running into the building for refuge, telling them that there are too many people already in those buildings, that there is no more room in the building to accommodate them, and that any time from now, the building will collapse, while she was speaking some people believed her and turned back while others continued running into that building, then I saw that she also had her own building, but what I realised was her building was standing on sand, but some people went into her building, at this point the Rain increased and became very violent and when it beat upon the building that was on the rock, the shaking was strong but this Great House stood firm. As the flood continued moving everything else on its way was destroyed, and I saw how some people had themselves under trees, yet the violent flood uprooted the trees, then the Flood reached to the level where the other house that was standing on the sand was, as it beat the house the house was totally destroyed at the twinkling of an eye, and all those who were in it, were carried along by the flood!
At this point, I saw that everything had been carried away, only those in the House that was on the rock survived and I saw them praising God, and the clouds became bright and there was a great light!

At this Level the vision ended, and I was disturbed with the vision so I began praying against the Storm, then the word of the Lord Came to Me thus;
/Prophet of the Most High, do not weary yourself in Praying against that storm, there is nothing You or the Sons of Men can do to avert that storm for it is by the decree of the Sovereign Lord!

O the Lion has roared who will not fear ? the Lord Has Spoken who will not hear ? The storm is coming, so therefore Prepare Yourself less Your Faith Fail, and you faint in the Days of adversity/.

>>At this point it was revealed to me, that that house on the rock is the Church of the Living God.
>> The woman is the spirit of Jezebel and her house is a false religious system, Babylon!
>>The spirit of Jezebel will try to distract many from seeking refuge in the Church.
>>The storm is significant of judgments of wars, plagues, famines that will come upon the earth!
>>The Church of the Living God shall be the only city of refuge from these evil occurrences!

1-The Holy Spirit is calling on Christians to depart from the path of unrighteousness, depart from unholiness, depart from worldliness, return to the Lord with heartfelt prayers of repentance, commit your heart to the Lord through fellowship with the Spirit and Meditation on the scriptures!
2-The Holy Spirit is calling on Ministers of the Gospel, to focus on Soul winning, to Preach the Gospel of the Kingdom with boldness and He will confirm the words with signs, wonders, and Miracles for the Salvation of Souls!
3-For those who are not yet in Christ, the Holy Spirit Says as You Hear the Voice of God, Harden not your hearts, it’s time to seek refuge in the Church of the Living God for nothing in this world can save you from the storm coming!
The Priest of God.
Great Grace!

visions.title: The Vision of the Heavenly Market!
visions.headerText: The Vision of the Heavenly Market!
visions.content:
After I saw the vision of the Lord Jesus coming as the Rewarder to the saints and was meditating upon it, the heavens were opened again unto me and I saw two more visions,

I saw a vision where, the Hand of God carried me into a glorious city and it was a very beautiful city with extremely awesome buildings, built with precious stones like gold and diamond, and the hand of the Lord set me in a place that looked like a market, and I saw fruits but the sizes were abnormally huge, an Apple was the size of a watermelon and the fruits were so fresh and sweet savour came from them. While I was admiring the fruits, I saw thousands of men and women also looking at the fruits in amazement of how huge and fresh they are, then I heard a voice that said;

/stretch your hand, take and freely eat of the fruits you desire for they have all been paid for/

Then at this, the vision ended, and while I was pondering on this vision to have understanding, the Holy Spirit said to me
/Now is the time of Favor, all they that have obtained mercy from the Father through the Blood of the Lamb, shall be Highly Favored in all their ways, and they shall be satisfied with the goodness of the Father/
Then Holy Spirit brought this scripture to my remembrance;

Isaiah 55:1-3 KJV
Ho, every one that thirsteth, come ye to the waters, and he that hath no money; come ye, buy, and eat; yea, come, buy wine and milk without money and without price.
Wherefore do ye spend money for that which is not bread? and your labour for that which satisfieth not? hearken diligently unto me, and eat ye that which is good, and let your soul delight itself in fatness.
Incline your ear, and come unto me: hear, and your soul shall live; and I will make an everlasting covenant with you, even the sure mercies of David.

Great Grace
The Priest of God

I pray for You, May the Lord God satisfy you with Favor and may you be satisfied with the goodness of the rivers of His pleasures... Amen!

visions.title: The Vision about the Demonic Agenda to corrupt the Worship Ministry!
visions.headerText: The Vision about the Demonic Agenda to corrupt the Worship Ministry!
visions.content:
While I was waiting on the Lord, to know his mind for this time and season, His Word came to me thus;

/This is the season where the Spirit of grace and supplication will be poured upon the saints to summon men and women into the secret place, to minister unto the Lord and bear the burdens of God through their priesthood for the advancement of His Purpose on earth./

When the Lord spoke to me, He opened my eyes and I saw indescribable beings in the clouds and an angel of the Lord revealed to me that those beings were Cherubims and Seraphims, the Angel said to me that the Lord is releasing them as ministering spirits to the earth realm to usher the saints into a realm of fellowship with the Holy Father.
The Angel said that the Cherubims are assigned to communicate the Glory of God into the atmosphere while the Seraphim are assigned to communicate the Holiness of God into the atmosphere and this atmosphere will influence the saints to walk in the consciousness of the Holy Father.

While he was talking to me, I was carried to an assembly of Christians in worship, while they were worshipping God, their words were transformed into a thick white smoke going up to heaven and afterwards it returned on them as rain, each drop containing light, which when it came back upon the people, it revived, renewed and refreshed them.

Then as we watched, I was carried again to another assembly of people worshipping God but I saw something strange, theirs was a thick dark smoke, it did not ascend to God, rather it surrounded them and out of the smoke emanated a very bad odor like that of dead flies and the odor came upon the people and remained on them.
When I saw this, I asked the Angel what was wrong;
And the Angel said come and see, immediately I was in another vision of God, in this vision I saw demons and evil spirits that had very bad odour, speaking in a strange tongue and each time they spoke the tongues, they multiplied themselves after a while, wind carry them into the atmosphere, and their targets were Pastors and Gospel Ministers especially girls.
They specifically tagetted girls gifted in singing and choir members, when this was done, these girls began speaking in that same tongue, but unfortunately most of them where not aware. Now whenever the girls began leading worship and spoke in those tongues the thick dark cloud will cover the assembly and out of the thick dark clouds will proceed that bad odor.

And the Angel said to me;
The Evil One in his subtle wisdom and crafty ways has released an Evil Spirit to corrupt the Spiritual Atmosphere of the Saints by Influencing them to speak in tongues inspired by the flesh and familiar spirits, so instead of praying to God, they are enchanting demons, cursing themselves and committing their bodies to the hands of Evil Spirits.

Then the Angel showed me further, I saw a Woman very beautiful with very long hair, longer than her and with very bright eyes, and the Angel said that is the Spirit of Delilah and she has been granted an assignment by the Evil One against servants of God, to seduce them and cause them to transgress the commandments of the Most High God by sexual sins.

The spirit was assigned to female Gospel musicians and I saw in the visions when they start singing and speaking in tongues, they were casting spells of lust on the People present and they will seduce and entice the servants of God into sexual immorality with them.

I saw again that this demon had beings around her, worshipping her yet they were Gospel singers and these ones unlike the others were conscious that they are possessed with those evil spirits and where on assignment to pollute the sanctuary of God with sexual immorality. I saw these female so called Gospel artists leading other younger girls into having sexual intercourse with them, introducing them into homosexuality, all this in church.

At this Point I was very disturbed and the vision ended, I kept praying asking the Lord what should be done;
And the Holy Spirit said that all music ministers in church must consecrate themselves - spirit, soul and body to walk in righteousness and Holiness, because the responsibility to provoke and sustain the manifestation of God in this time and season is upon them, that's why the devil is coming after them, but the devil will not be able to operate through those who walk in the Light of Life.

And the Holy Spirit brought these scriptures to My remembrance;

John 4:23 KJV
But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him.

Romans 12:1 KJV
I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable worship.

I counsel the Female Gospel Musicians to AVOID serving God according to the standards of the World, they must serve and follow God by the standard of the Word, because they are called to give pleasure to the Lord God through their worship and praise but their worship is Only acceptable to the Righteous One when they offer their body as living sacrifice to God.

Dear daughters of zion arise and lead the church to the place of intimacy with God through the Spirit of God, refuse to be Vessels in the hands of Satan to cause the downfall of His servants, for you are ordained to be Vessels of honor in the hands of God to draw men and women closer to God.

Great grace;
The Priest of God.

visions.title: The Vision of The Lord Jesus And The Reward Of The Saints!
visions.headerText: The Vision of The Lord Jesus And The Reward Of The Saints!
visions.content:
On the 23/04/ 2023 which was a Sunday Morning, I was in the place of prayer from 12 am to around 5 am, as My custom is to make intercession for the Church, the saints and Pastors that the Lord will Show Himself Mighty in our services by Many infallible proofs, and while I was praying, I saw 3 Visions, which are for the comfort, strengthening and encouragement of the Saints.

This is the First vision I saw, In this vision, I saw thousands of Saints upon a Great and High Mountain, which in the Spirit is called Mount Zion. This mountain had seven layers and I saw in one of the layers, thousands upon thousands of Saints working on the mountain, some were praying, some were teaching, while others were supplying the needs of those who were praying and teaching, and I saw that there were beings that moved in the midst of the saints with Scrolls and ink horns and were writing down in full details everything that were done by the saints. I saw that for those who prayed, all the hours to the minutes, they prayed were recorded and for those who taught, all what they taught was recorded.

I saw these Angels acend to another layer still on Mount Zion and on that Layer I saw the Spirits of Just Men Made Perfect, they were in councils and their discussions pertaining the Purpose of the Most High God in all the Worlds.

An Angel went into another layer and this time, he entered into a place where there were books, millions of books and there he kept the records of what he had written down.

While I was watching the vision, I heard a trumpet sound and all the beings both in the layer of the saints who were still on earth and those who are the layer of spirit of just men made perfect, everyone lay flat in worship and adoration to the Great King and Lord of Spirits - Jesus the Christ and I saw the Lord Jesus descended to the Layer of the saints who were still on earth but in service to him, and when He came before anyone of them, a scroll will appear in his hands, and He will read the things which were written in the scroll of the person and pronounce blessings upon the person, he did this for everyone one by one, and only the person who was being blessed could understand the words of his blessings but to others it sounded like tongues.

At this point, the vision ended and when I got up, the time was 6:30 am and while I was meditating on the vision to seek understanding, the Holy Spirit said to me...

/The Lord Jesus takes account to the details of all what is done for the glory of His name and the advancement of His Kingdom, the services and sacrifices done for the sake of Christ are not in Vain for He Himself is the Great Reward and Rewarder of the labour of Love of the saints, thus Let he who teaches, Keep teaching, let he who prays keep praying, let he who gives keep giving, let he who serves, keep Serving for the time of Rewards is at hand, but in all you do in words and in works let it be done in the Name of the Lord Jesus and for His Glory /

Then also I had an understanding by the inspiration of the Holy Spirit;
Only through ministering to the Lord in worship and praise can we receive the reward of our labour of Love in ministering unto the saints.

And while I was writing this vision, the Holy Spirit brought this scripture to My Remembrance;

Isaiah 62:11 KJV
Behold, the Lord hath proclaimed unto the end of the world, Say ye to the daughter of Zion, Behold, thy salvation cometh; behold, his reward is with him, and his work before him.

Dear Saints be not discouraged on because you have not yet see a reward for your service and sacrifice for the Kingdom of Christ, for Many Christians it has gotten to a point where you are doubting if truly You are serving the Most High God, it has come to the Point that your Life has become a mockery to people on account of your service but be encouraged Dear Servants of God, if what you are doing is by the revelation of the Spirit and agrees with the Scripture then you are Serving God. Be encouraged by this Oracle and keep on doing the work God has entrusted in your hands for this is good in the sight of the Lord and in due time, he shall Reward You!

I pray for You, May the Grace of God strengthen your feet to walk with Jesus and empower your hands to work for Jesus, and May the Father and God of Our Lord Jesus, who is the Faithful Covenant Keeping God, Remember your labour of Love and give you a blessing that will make you the praise of your family.

Great grace
The Priest of God

visions.title: The Visions of God From 2024 (Part 1 - Visions concerning the Body of Christ)!
visions.headerText: The Visions of God From 2024 (Part 1 - Visions concerning the Body of Christ)!
visions.content:
I was caught up in the Realm of the Spirit on a High Mountain wherein I saw what looked like Plasma Television screens but in the form of a Cloud, thousands of them and in each of them visions were shown! These visions were concerning People, Nations, Languages and Kings.

These are some of the Visions I saw on the Cloud-Screen concerning the Body of Christ

1. The Lord has decreed this Year to the Body of Christ as the Year of Preparation and Quickening, The Saints are to be prepared through the Ministry of the Word and are to be quickened through the Ministry of Prayer to know and Do The Will of God and fulfill His Purpose, There must be a consecration of the flesh in order to be aligned to the desires of the Spirit. In the Visions of God, I saw a Great war in The Spirit and I saw a red dragon from whose mouth came forth water, and each time it opened its mouth the water came forth to carry away the saints of God, and the Spirit of the Lord revealed to me that the water from the Mouth of the dragon is the Spirit of Deception, and Many of those who have not been rooted in Christ through the knowledge of the doctrine of Christ shall give heed to seducing spirits and shall begin to obey the doctrine of the devil and this shall cause them to shipwreck their faith.

2. In the Visions of God, the Lord appeared to me and his Angel gave me a message thus /You are degrading Jesus when You walk in unbelief, ingratitude, and unrighteousness/! The Father is calling the Church to Magnify the Lord Jesus by walking by faith, working righteousness, and continually giving thanks to Him for this Is His Perfect will for the Church of Christ.

3. In the Visions of God, I heard this /Jesus is coming very soon but the number of women prepared for his coming are very very few/. The Lord is revealing that emphasis be placed on Ministering to women. It was also revealed to me that the attention of Spirits has been shifted to women because they will be instruments to cause the rising or downfall of Many People, nations, and Kings, in this regard the Lord commands that Prayers be made for all women, conferences be organized to teach women to know the Will of God and to do it.

4. The enemy has released the Spirit of Corruption and perversion specifically to infiltrate the children's departments of churches. In the Visions of God, I saw strange children from the water who were assigned to children's departments in churches and they were filled with Satanic and sensual wisdom to lure children into despicable Immorality, stubbornness, lying and stealing. Thus every church must pay more attention to the children's department, henceforth, carry them along in all Spiritual activities even preaching, and let those who will pastor those departments be carefully chosen through the Wisdom of the Spirit.

5. The Lord said that this Year, He will make a difference between those who serve him and those who do not, they who serve God shall spend the days of this year in the pleasures of God and they shall prosper in all things this Year.

6. In the Visions of God, I saw a thick dark cloud, and I heard thunder rumblings from within it then all of a sudden, I saw millions of lightning bolts break forth and were scattered in all directions. This year shall be the Year of the emergence of the hidden ones, the Men and Women who have been mentored by the Holy Spirit in the secret Place, their light shall break forth speedily, and all those who have been waiting upon the Lord for years, this year shall be their year of showing forth.

7. In the Visions of God, I saw the Heavens opened and I saw a Mighty outpouring of Showers from on High, and The decree of the Lord unto the rain was thus; Refresh the Weary, Revive the Faint and Renew the face of My Church,/ this year, the Lord Will visit all those who have been waiting upon him and shall grant their requests according to His will, I can authoritatively say that this year many stubborn problems will be solved through the intervention of the Great God.

8. The Lord Said to me /Herod has demanded the Head of John, James and Peter./ When I heard this, I saw in the visions of God that the Devil is stirring the hearts of men and women in government so that they may stretch their hands and afflict the sheep of God by cutting off the shepherds. Governments will sign decrees against the Church and some of the decrees will be aimed at controlling the wealth and activities of some major Pastors and I saw that many will receive this news with gladness and even some Christians but unknown to them this is all a strategy to cut off the heads of churches, they will seek to imprison or even kill many and I even saw how in a certain Church the government forcefully removed the General Overseer and founder of a Ministry and installed someone else. In this vision, I understood that the governments took advantage of the disputes in churches brought to Courts, so I strongly counsel by the grace of God given to me, let Christians refrain from taking the issues that concern the church of God to the courts of men, even as scriptures have instructed, let the matters of the Church be judged by the Elders of the Body of Christ in that region or nation (1 Corinthians 6:1-10). Nevertheless, the Lord Instructs His servants to be faithful to him even unto the death and also the Lord commands Christians to pray for the Pastors daily that they may be delivered from wicked and unreasonable Men.

9. I saw a Great Light Shining Upon a House, that Light was so bright that it made everything transparent, for it pierced through everything as A sword. And Then I heard the Voice of the Holy One say / The Light will shine and even now is already shining, the intents and works of Many shall be exposed, and he that walks in truth shall not fear for when he comes into the Light his works shall be made manifest that they were wrought through the Spirit and it shall be known that he is a worker of righteousness, but he that is evil shall be ashamed for when he comes into the Light his works shall be made manifest that they are of the flesh and it shall be known that he is a worker of iniquity/. I saw Great lamenting in some Ministries on account of secret things being made public and I heard the decree / consider Your ways, examine Yourself whether you are in the Faith, for He that Judges himself shall not be judged/

10. This Year shall be a year of restoration for many who hath backslidden. In the Visions of God, I saw the hand of a Potter making vessels fit for His Use, and though some were marred, he broke them and made them again as it seemed good to use. Now something I realize even the vessels whom I thought had become useless after the Touch of the Potter became useful again. This year the Lord has stretched his hand to those who had fallen and He desires to restore them to profitable service for the kingdom but this will only be when they submit themselves to the Dealings of God through which they will be broken and re-designed in the image of Christ.

11. The Devil will change the weapons employed to fight the Faith, the battle shall no longer be on terms of Magic but on terms of Logic, and due to great breakthroughs in technology and in Medical Science, the Devil will seek to turn Many away from the Faith with strong arguments based on Logic and Worldly philosophies.

12. In the Visions of God I saw the release of the cherubim and the seraphim into the congregation of the righteous, the seraphim were charged to communicate the Holiness of God into the atmosphere, while cherubim were charged to communicate the glory of God into the atmosphere. How be it this is a Mystery for I’m speaking about Men, yes Even women, these are those whom the Lord had prepared for such a time as this, a sacred remnant who have not bowed down Babylon and whose mouths has not eaten her delicacies, they are being sent to preserve the heritage of God in this last days by upholding the standards of Holiness in the midst of corruption and reveal the Glory of God in the Midts of depravity.

Great Grace
The Priest of God

visions.title: The Visions of God From 2024 (Part 2 - Visions About The World)!
visions.headerText: The Visions of God From 2024 (Part 2 - Visions About The World)!
visions.content:
I was caught up in the Realm of the Spirit on High Mountain wherein I saw what looked like Plasma Television screens, thousands of them and in each of them visions were being shown ! These visions were concerning People, Nations, Languages and Kings.

These are some of the visions I saw about the World

1. The Lord Said to me that 2024 is the Year of the Beginning of Sorrows, for the great woman has entered into her travail and she shall weep and Lament because of her labor pains/

2. In the visions of God I saw a beast go through Many nations and wherever it went the place was left in fire and blood ( I will give the Prophecies mentioning the nations in which I saw this happen for now I will give myself to intercession to see if it can be averted but if not, then I will say them as a testimony to the Nations that The sovereign Lord knows all the ways of Men and he rewards them according to their works)

3. In the Visions of God I saw a Flying Sword, and this Sword was released against the Kings, and Men of influence, those whom on account of Power and fame have become Proud. There will be strange plagues that will befall the Mighty and the rich which will torment them severely and this will cause Many of them to humble themselves and seek the Face of the Lord because they will be unable to find help through their Money and thus will turn to the Lord for Help and He in His Mercy will Help them and they shall become instruments of righteousness in the hands of the Lord.

4. This year shall mark the beginning of the dethrone of one of the ‘gods’ of this World known as Mammon. I Saw in the Visions of God a highly exalted Being dressed in the most expensive clothes and laced with all kinds of jewelry, I saw an earthquake and his throne broke into Two and He fell Into the dunghill, This Year Money Shall begin to fail, and also nations will begin moving from physical money to virtual Money to exert more control on the wealth of People and the nations will take Money from the wealthy of nations to invest in Purchasing weapons of war.

5. In the Visions of God I saw people walking on the road and a wind came from the wilderness and began to slay them and the people began to suddenly fall and die. I saw that there will be 3 extremely deadly plagues that will hit the world this year, One will cause incurable boils on the flesh, one will be a virus that destroys internal organs the deadliest shall be one that will be like a fever (More details on where and when this will start will be given on later after intercessions).

6. In the visions of God, I saw Great shakings, especially in Europe and Asia and I saw the earth open her mouth and after that, I saw entire cities swallowed. There will be terrible earthquakes that are ordained to swallow humans and properties! questions.title: Question: Good Day sir, please I want to enquire on the subject of Spiritual Fatherhood! Who is a Spiritual Father and is it compulsory to have one before you succeed as a Pastor?
questions.headerText: Who is a Spiritual Father and is it compulsory to have one before you succeed as a Pastor?
questions.content:
Answer: I will answer this question with two separate posts so that it won't be too long, in this first post I will address who is a Spiritual Father and in the second post I will address if it's compulsory to have a Spiritual Father to succeed as a Pastor!

Now, to address the issue of Spiritual fatherhood, I want to first say that the term Spiritual Father is a term used to describe a Father in the Lord but by accurate scriptural disposition, God is the ONLY Spiritual Father, because the term Spiritual Father means Father of Spirit and the scripture clearly says this;

Hebrews 12:9 KJV
/Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us, and we gave them reverence: shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits, and live?/

Now you see there are fathers of our flesh and father of our spirits. Take note of that Word there 'of' not 'in' meaning they are the source.

Our fathers of the flesh are the ones who impregnated our mothers, so we have our flesh from them while our Father in the Spirit is God Almighty Himself, Our Lord Jesus said this;

John 20:17 KJV
/Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God./

Listen to what God Almighty Himself says;

2 Corinthians 6:17-18 KJV
/Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you, [18] And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty./

We see again our God Almighty declares that He Himself will be our Father and this was fulfilled through the sacrifice of Christ.

Let us have the another witness to this truth, let's listen to Apostle Paul;

Romans 1:7 KJV
/To all that be in Rome, beloved of God, called to be saints: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ./

Here we see again, Apostle Paul Says that God is our Father.

Having clarified that appellation, let me emphasize again that when we say Spiritual Father, we are trying to refer to that person who a Father In the Lord, or Father in the Faith or Father in the Gospel!

Now let us advance;
Through the witness of the scriptures, we understand that having a Father in the Lord is pleasing in the sight of God, it is written;

Ephesians 6:1 KJV
/Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right./

We see that we can have parents in the Lord, but what does this mean according to scriptures?

1. A Father in the Lord is the one who begot you through the preaching of the Gospel [1 Corinthians 4:15]: no one can beget himself in the Lord, the scripture explains this in Romans 10:8-17, of importance is this portion;

Romans 10:13-14 KJV
/For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved. [14] How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard? and how shall they hear without a preacher?/

The person who preached and you believe and got saved and born again is your Father or Mother in the Lord.

2. Your Father in the Lord is the one who Labours in the Word and Prayer for Christ to be formed in you [Galatians 4:19]: sometimes the person who preached and you believed and was saved is not the same person who teaches you the doctrine of Christ through which your soul is conformed to the Image of Christ. That's why an Evangelist can preach to you and you believe and receive Christ and then you start attending a church and the Pastor who is teaching you the doctrine becomes your Father in the Lord, so though he did not beget you, he is the one forming the image of Christ in you.

3. Your Father in the Lord is the one ordained by God to watch over your Soul [Hebrews 13:17]: now notice scripture says watching over your soul, not your Spirit [Only God Almighty can watch over your Spirit] but men are called to watch over your Souls, these can be shepherds or Pastors, so if you are attending a church, the Pastor of the Church automatically becomes your Father in the Lord because at that Season of Your Life that is the person who watches over your soul before God.

4. Your Father in the Lord is the Person who births you into Ministry [Philippians 2:22]: Now some times when a Pastor calls someone his father in the Lord, it may be on account of the person birthing him into Ministry or having the oversight of his Ministry, so like Paul said concerning Timothy and Mark, he called them sons not because he begot them but because they served under him in ministry and were through his ministry birth into ministry and he Paul had oversight over them, so you see Paul will write letters to Timothy, Titus and Philemon, counseling them how to carry out the ministry they have received charge for.

Finally, let me counsel how you should relate with your Parents in the Lord;

1. Submit yourself to them : [1 Peter 5:5] Submitting yourself is bringing yourself under their authority, now this is for your own advantage and to make their work for you easier for them, rebellion will only delay your formation and hinder your enthronement. Submission is not an emotional matter, we see this in the story of Sarah and Hagar, when Sarah maltreated Hagar, Hagar ran away but when she met the angel of the Lord she was sent back, see this;

Genesis 16:6-10 KJV
/But Abram said unto Sarai, Behold, thy maid is in thy hand; do to her as it pleaseth thee. And when Sarai dealt hardly with her, she fled from her face. [7] And the angel of the Lord found her by a fountain of water in the wilderness, by the fountain in the way to Shur. [8] And he said, Hagar, Sarai's maid, whence camest thou? and whither wilt thou go? And she said, I flee from the face of my mistress Sarai. [9] And the angel of the Lord said unto her, Return to thy mistress, and submit thyself under her hands.
[10] And the angel of the Lord said unto her, I will multiply thy seed exceedingly, that it shall not be numbered for multitude./

Now you see, despite the fact that Hagar was maltreated, the Angel asked her to go back and submit herself to Sarah and the angel explained thus, that the child in her womb [her own ministry] can receive the necessary Impartation to become great. So you don't submit because the mentorship is pleasant and sweet but because it is the process by which you are prepared and equipped unto greatness.

Now it is worthy to take note that when Haggar ran away, when the Angel met her, he Called her /Sarah's Maid/, meaning in the sight of God she was still Sarah's maid though she had ran away [when you want to leave a mentorship system don't run away, it is better to approach your mentor so you can be released for your own good].

2. Follow them [1 Corinthians 11:1]
God expects us to follow our parents in the Lord as sheep follows it's shepherd, but we must follow them if and only if they themselves are following Christ which is known by the conformity of their lives to the scriptures.

3. Obey them [Hebrews 13:17]:
Given the responsibility to shepherd your soul, your Parents in the Lord deserve your obedience, because often the instructions that make for your growth in Christ and alignment to the purpose of God will be released from their mouth and disobeying such is denying yourself the advantage of advancing in the ways of God.

4. Honour them [Ephesians 6:1-3]
Your parents in the Lord deserve your unconditional honour for the role God ordained them to achieve in your life. Now there is a difference between obedience and Honour; you only obey them when their instructions agree with the standards of God as revealed in the scripture but if it does not agree you should not obey them but you must still honor them. Let me explain, if lady has a Father in the Lord whom approaches her for illicit sexual relationship, she should not agree no matter the pressure but also she should not take advantage of that to dishonour him and begin to insult him publicly. We must be careful not to fall into the trap of dishonoring whom we ought to honour. Nowadays, it is very common for people to leave a certain man whom was their Father in the Lord and begin speaking against the person because of the errors they saw, but let me say this to you, /Sons do not circumcise Fathers/ if you see your father's nakedness and realize he is not circumcised then take it upon yourself to circumcise him, God will judge you. It is arrogance and pride for a son to take upon himself the responsibility to circumcise a father. And strangely when fathers circumcise sons, they do it in the private but when sons want to circumcise fathers they do it publicly on social media, see the hypocrisy. A son makes errors, his father corrects him privately but when the father makes an error the sons takes it to social media. Sons who claim to expose their fathers are most often sons whom the fathers had covered. I repeat SONS DO NOT CIRCUMCISE FATHERS! Sadly, we are the generation of which the scripture prophesied thus;

Proverbs 30:11 KJV
/There is a generation that curseth their father, and doth not bless their mother./

That warning is from the Spirit and this applies to our generation for according to the Speakings of the Spirit, one of the signs of end times is thus;

2 Timothy 3:1-2 KJV
/This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come. [2] For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,/

Notice that one of the signs is DISOBEDIENCE TO PARENTS.
But for those who chose to walk on that path, let me show what the judgment of such is;

Proverbs 20:20 KJV
/Whoso curseth his father or his mother, his lamp shall be put out in obscure darkness./

You see that? It is wisdom to refrain yourself from speaking against Fathers in the Lord, because of their errors. Remember that Jesus is called the Son of David, the same David who took a man's wife, impregnated her and conspired for him to be killed to cover his sins. Yet Jesus is not ashamed to be called the Son of David. God has reserved for himself the right to judge Fathers.

God demands that there be peace amongst fathers and sons, scripture says;
Malachi 4:5-6 KJV
/Behold, I will send you Elijah the prophet before the coming of the great and dreadful day of the Lord : [6] And he shall turn the heart of the fathers to the children, and the heart of the children to their fathers, lest I come and smite the earth with a curse./

Whenever you see an issue in ministry at the root of it is a problem with fatherhood or sonship. So I recommend that we take these truths seriously.

questions.title: Question: Must I have a Spiritual Father to Succeed as a Pastor?
questions.headerText: Must I have a Spiritual Father to Succeed as a Pastor?
questions.content:
Answer: Now in the former post I addressed the subject of who is a Spiritual Father

Now let me address the part of the question, where you asked if it is compulsory to have a Spiritual Father to Succeed in Ministry.

First of all, this is a very important question because its response will help to address the concerns of Many on this subject
. Let me begin by saying that, the major requirement for fulfilling the purpose of God as a Minister is Fellowship with the Holy Spirit, it is written;

Acts 13:2 KJV;
/As they ministered to the Lord, and fasted, the Holy Ghost said, Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them./

The Holy Spirit is the custodian of the Will of God for Men, therefore only Him can reveal the deep things of God to them. We see how the Holy Spirit said /Separate to me Barnabas and Saul for the work which he has called them, / so the Holy Spirit is the one that calls men into that which they were predestined to do in God before the foundations of the World. God does not call men, he ordains them while they are still in him unto a purpose and a good work, but when they come on earth, it's the responsibility of the Holy Spirit to call them into good work for no one knows the deep things of God except the Holy Spirit.

Today many people are frustrated in ministry because they were introduced to men before they were introduced to the Holy Spirit, they are more conscious of their relationship with men, than their fellowship with the Holy Spirit, they are more careful not to offend men than they are to grieve the Holy Spirit, this is because many do not understand that without the agreement of the Holy Spirit, no man can give or impart to you any spiritual substance, gifts or graces, it is written;

1 Corinthians 12:4,11 KJV
/There are different kinds of gifts, but the same Spirit distributes them./
All these (gifts of healing, prophecy, miracles etc) are the works of one and the same Spirit, and he distributes them to each one, just as He wills.

Now, we see here that it is the Holy Spirit who distributes gifts not men, yes it is true that He often give the gifts through the Laying on of hands but he is the One that gives as He Wills, not as you or your Spiritual Father Wills. If the Holy Spirit does not want you to receive a particular gift you will never have it no matter who lays his hands on you, that is why it is important to pay attention to your fellowship with the Holy Spirit.

Now we can see this as one of the concerns of Apostle Paul, when he met a group of disciples, see what he asked them;

Acts 19:2 KJV
/He said unto them, Have ye received the Holy Ghost since ye believed? And they said unto him, we have not so much as heard whether there be any Holy Ghost./

You see the focus, He is concerned if they have received the Holy Spirit and not if they have a Spiritual Father.

But now without the Ministry of Sent Men and women it will be hard to fulfill the purpose of God on earth, every sheep needs a shepherd and work of A Father or Mentor is to act as a shepherd to you and guide you through the grace and wisdom of God into all that which us ordained for you by the Holy Spirit.
It's true the Holy Spirit is the One Who calls Men, but to avoid you making alot of errors on account of immaturity the Holy Spirit will lead to a Man or woman unto whom he has given charge to watch over your soul!
If you read across scriptures you will realize that the Ministry of the Holy Spirit is introduced on the earth realm by the ministry of sent Men.
Let's analyze scriptures on this subject;

From the scriptures we Clearly understand the concept of Spiritual Parenting, and let me emphasize that it is very necessary. Taking for example Apostle Paul, he had a face to face encounter with the Lord Jesus himself, but when he asked the Lord what will be done, the Lord sent him to the city to wait for a man, and the Lord Jesus went and instructed Ananias to go and preach to Paul and pray for him to receive the Holy Spirit [Acts 9:1-17].

Now we see here that the person who begot the great Apostle Paul in the Lord was a common disciple called Ananias.

I've gone through the scripture severally I have not seen where the Holy Spirit was given to any man in the absence of someone Laying hands or preaching. You see that even when the Lord Jesus appeared, he did not give Paul the Holy Spirit, He had to go and send Ananias to go and do that, now if the Lord could do it by himself he will not go and ask Ananias to do it. Let me show you something concerning this truth;

Acts 8:15-17 KJV
/Who, when they were come down, prayed for them, that they might receive the Holy Ghost: [16] (For as yet he was fallen upon none of them: only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus.) [17] Then laid they their hands on them, and they received the Holy Ghost./

Notice the people believed and were baptized with water, yet the Holy Spirit had not come upon them. What was he waiting for? Ofcourse he was waiting for the Apostles of God. When the Apostles came and laid their hands on the disciples at Samaria the Holy Spirit came upon them. You see again how relevant the Ministry of sent men is.

No matter your encounters, if they are genuine, the Lord will lead you to a man or woman to whom he will give charge over your soul and make them your shepherd.
Let us see the case of our Lord Jesus;
Luke 1:31-32 KJV
/And, behold, thou shalt conceive in thy womb, and bring forth a son, and shalt call his name JESUS. [32] He shall be great, and shall be called the Son of the Highest: and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David:/

Angel Gabriel said to Mary that she will give birth to the son of the Highest, and we know that the highest is God Almighty, then he continues by saying God will give him the throne of his father David. Now, that seem confusing, is his father David or the highest? He is the Son of God but when it comes to obtaining an inheritance he must subscribe himself to a tribe, this is because in the Kingdom of God, inheritance is alloted according to tribes; for example Priesthood Is the inheritance of the Tribe of Levi, if you are not from that tribe You cannot obtain priesthood same as Royalty is from Judah, If you are not from Judah you cannot become a King. So God has hidden inheritances in lineages and tribes and you can only obtain them when you subscribe to those tribes.

The graces and the gifts of the Spirit are hidden in men, and thus are rarely transferred without the ministry of men, see what Apostle Paul Said;

Ephesians 3:1-2 KJV
/For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles, [2] If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to you-ward:/

Now see that, God gave the Grace for us to Paul, meaning if you despise Paul you will never get that Grace no matter how you pray and fast. There are men and women in whom your inheritance is kept by God and until you submit yourself to them you will not have it. Let us see something;

2 Timothy 1:6 KJV
/Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God, which is in thee by the putting on of my hands./

Notice the gift of God came into Timothy through the Hands of Paul. Graces and gifts are transferred from generation to generation through the agency of men to men.

So conclusively, you should submit yourself to mentorship of God through a Man for this will be unto an advantage in executing the purpose of God.

questions.title: Question: Shalom Man of God,  I'm a little concerned about the act of printing stickers and wristbands and selling them in churches, please can you enlighten me on this? Are stickers and wristbands scriptural or is it merely a business strategy to raise funds for the ministry?
questions.headerText: Are stickers and wristbands scriptural or is it merely a business strategy to raise funds for the ministry?
questions.content:
Answer : The subject of stickers and other prophetic materials is a very divisive one in the Church of God, thus in answering this question, I will restrain myself to speak only within the confines of the scriptures, so that I will not bring in my personal opinion which is founded on the revelations and visions I have from the Lord on this subject.

First of all, it is important that we understand that stickers and wristbands have their origin from the commandments that God gave to Moses, and when God introduced them he clearly stated the reason for its production.

It is written in Deuteronomy 11:18-21;
/Therefore you shall lay up these words of mine in your heart and in your soul. You shall bind them for a sign on your hand, and they shall be for frontlets between your eyes.
19 You shall teach them to your children, talking of them when you sit in your house, when you walk by the way, when you lie down, and when you rise up.
20 You shall write them on the door posts of your house and on your gates;
21 that your days and your children’s days may be multiplied in the land which Yahweh swore to your fathers to give them, as the days of the heavens above the earth./

Now this is exactly where the concept of stickers and wrists bands originated from among the Jews and the People of God.

God in his wisdom introduced this concept to help his people meditate on the Word Day and Night. The Principle of meditation on the Word cannot be over emphasized for it is the pathway to the growth and maturity of the believer. Meditation on the word is the strategy the Holy Spirit uses to structure the minds of men to be conformed to the image of Christ and guide them to walk in the pathway of righteousness.

So as the Lord was instructing his people to lay up his words by meditating on them, he introduced a concert to keep them focused on the Word.

The Lord said this;
/Therefore, you shall lay up these words of mine in your heart and in your soul. You shall bind them for a sign on your hand, and they shall be for frontlets between your eyes.
19 You shall teach them to your children, talking of them when you sit in your house, when you walk by the way, when you lie down, and when you rise up.
20 You shall write them on the door posts of your house and on your gates;/
Here, the Lord said /write the scriptures and put them on your hand, and then write them on the door post of your house and on your gates/.

Now why all this?
The answer is in verse 19;
/You shall teach them to your children, talking of them when you sit in your house, when you walk by the way, then you lie down, and when you rise up./

So we see here that what God wanted was to create a system where they will constantly have remembrance on His Word.
